title: not getting blue essence at all
body:
after this new update I'm not getting blue essence at all!!! 
does anyone know why?
how do I fix this?
even when I'm olaying all this matches and wining but not getting any blue essence at all

replies.body:
No they do not reward you with BE even after leveling up. What you get is a capsule. Inside the capsule are champion shards. They will grant the champion they are for or can be disenchanted. Yes this is an overall rip off compared to what IP used to be. This all happened because people didn't want to buy runes before playing ranked. This also punished players who already had runes as it refunded all of them at 30% or lower. No the other system isn't coming back, sad day.

BE is only earnable through disenchanting shards. Earlier levels happen faster later levels take around 15-25 games depending on your win/loss. It's about 800 BE a capsule. This is a lot less then we used to make. Don't worry, unless you were an uber collector before you will not be able to get emotes or the warwick skin with the essence shop. Those items are also limited time value. Yes the champions cost the same even though it's harder to get in game currency.

Yes they want more people to buy champions with RP. I hope this covered everything.

You know, I once said to myself that Riot was a real good company that cares for its community. Jokes on me, they are money grubbing scumbags that utterly fucked anyone that is trying to start up. Shame riot, shame.

I dont like it at all i think its about the equivalent of EA on battle front 2 right now with how many hours you have to put in just to get a few champs It doesnt help out new players any at all either with their champ pool most people have played a long time and have close to every champ if not all new players will have to spend money or YEARS to get them all or even close to it

coming from a player who plays about 5 games or more a day, am level 37, and own all but 14 of the champions, you do not gain essence faster than you gained ip. i was able to buy a champ every like 3-4 days max, now i am able to get a high blue essence 6300 champ every like week-2 weeks. depending. the past 7 days i've only gained 2700 blue with disenchanting the champ shards from capsules. it is by no means as quick as earning ip from wins and losses.
The new system now rewards you with BE every time you level up. From now on (unless Riot changes the system), you can get BE from the capsule you obtain from leveling up.
not every time its based on chance

WTF people? You probably didn't even go trough the patch notes ... After the patch you gain more BE then you used to gain IP before(unless you are like 0.0000x% unlucky or smth) + you can upgrade the shards for 80% the store price of the champion. At most you can complaing about  the possibility of getting  lower values of BE compared to the last patch until you get the x10lvls reward(then you get a lot more per 10lvls).

These guys are basically saying that you get more atm  and that there will be future changes, seeing that most people cry as they can't adjust to changes and/or are unable/too lazy to read a forum post they might even boost the values or give bonus BE somehow else.

CALM YOUR DAMN TITTIES

an yet here we are where it takes longer to acquire the 7.8k needed than under the previous system :D you literally almost had a valid point but actual statistics just don't back up what you're saying. But hey keep that rito shield held tight maybe they'll have the consumers back again someday. Doubt it but there's that small chance I'm wrong.

So i get what your saying, you do get more blue essence when getting capsules AND getting a champion you want, but what if your like me and you only get champions you don't want. I want to buy Renekton   {{champion:58}}   and im 2k BE away and im not getting him in capsules. So what do I do then? Grind the game with champions that I hate and be miserable till i get Renekton   {{champion:58}}   ? Riot needs to allow players to get BE from games even if its just 30 - 40 per game, that would help players like me and i assume many others to get favourable champions without relying on luck, grinding or spending money on RP.

The main way of getting BE hasn't changed, you still get it from disenchanting shards and sometimes getting BE as a drop from chests and capsules. It's a little easier to get Essence now, since you can get more drops on levelups. I know some players are thinking this doesn't feel like a very good change, and the [**best place to put that feedback is here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/Jh3Mtzu6-blue-essence-earn-rates-learning-the-numbers-with-carl-and-henrietta) where the devs can see.

Came across this thread as I was searching for a solution, but it still doesn't answer my concerns. I've gotten capsules that gave me skins AND 10-20 blue essence as well, yet it still shows my amount being the same. Relogged and all. I ain't getting shit for the past 5+ times.

So i get what your saying, you do get more blue essence when getting capsules AND getting a champion you want, but what if your like me and you only get champions you don't want. I want to buy Renekton  and im 2k BE away and im not getting him in capsules. So what do I do then? Grind the game with champions that I hate and be miserable till i get Renekton  ?
